data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Tombali.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tombali, Guinea-Bissau
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Tombali to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,194 believers in Tombali to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Tombali, Guinea-Bissau.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Nalu people.
Lord, the believers in the state of Tombali, Guinea-Bissau need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Tombali, Guinea-Bissau that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Tombali, Guinea-Bissau a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Tombali
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Syrian, Balanta, Kentohe, Bambara, Balanta, Nyakra, Nalu
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Syrian (1,500), Balanta, Kentohe (392,000), Bambara (2,100), Balanta, Nyakra (15,000), Nalu (11,000)
